metadata.title: CVE-2010-3708 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The serialization implementation in JBoss Drools in Red Hat JBossEnterprise Application Platform (aka JBoss EAP or JBEAP) 4.3 before4.3.0.CP09 and JBoss Enterprise SOA Platform 4.2 and 4.3 supports theembedding of class files, which allows remote attackers to executearbitrary code via a crafted static initializer.

criterions.comment: jbossas4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
